column5: Right in the middle of 78704, home of Keep Austin Weird. Some of the top-rated restaurants, bars, and coffee shops only a quick walk away.  If you'd like to hit the festivals or downtown, a bus stop that is quick access to rest of the city. A cozy home, with a mid-century touch. Wifi, living room with TV, memory foam mattress for zzz's, kitchen, backyard and garden, plenty of board games, and option for laundry. Good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers.
